Title: Sentiment Analyzer
Description: Developed a web-based sentiment analysis tool using the cardiffnlp/twitter-roberta-base-sentiment model from Hugging Face. Integrated with Flask for a responsive UI that provides detailed sentiment insights. Useful for analyzing product reviews, customer feedback, or social media sentiment.

Title: URL Shortener
Description: Built a URL shortening tool that converts long URLs into short, trackable links. Features include redirection handling, basic analytics, and user-friendly interface.

Title: Text Summarizer
Description: Created a text summarization app using Hugging Face's distilbart-cnn-12-6 model. Used Gradio to build a user interface where users can input text and receive a concise summary. Deployed on Hugging Face Spaces for accessibility.

Title: Dock Safety Detection in Industrial Warehouses
Description: Built a safety detection system using YOLOv5 to identify persons, forklifts, and obstacles in warehouse dock areas. Annotated data with LabelImg and integrated prediction into a Flask-based UI.

Title: Cold Email Generator Using LLMs
Description: Created an AI-powered app that scrapes job descriptions and generates personalized cold emails based on the user's profile. Used LangChain and Groqâ€™s LLaMA 3.1 model, integrated with Streamlit for an interactive UI. Supports dynamic profile input via CSV or ChromaDB.
Techstack: LangChain, LLaMA 3.1, Groq, Streamlit, Prompt Engineering
